name: Tabernas Desert
hint: Europe's only true semi-arid desert, in southeastern Spain, used as a film set for westerns

name: Bardenas Reales
hint: Striking badlands and semi-desert in Navarre, Spain, a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve

name: Oleshky Sands
hint: Largest sand area in Europe, in southern Ukraine near the Dnieper River delta

name: Ryn Desert
hint: Sandy desert in western Kazakhstan extending into the European steppe near the Caspian

name: Błędów Desert
hint: Largest accumulation of loose sand in Central Europe, in southern Poland

name: Monegros
hint: Semi-arid steppe region in Aragon, Spain, one of the driest areas in Europe

name: Highlands of Iceland
hint: Vast volcanic desert interior of Iceland, largely uninhabited lava and ash fields

name: Cabo de Gata
hint: Arid coastal natural park in Almeria, Spain, the driest region of continental Europe

name: Deliblato Sands
hint: Large sandy terrain in Serbia's Vojvodina region, the largest European sand dune area in the Balkans

name: Piscinas Dunes
hint: Sahara-like sand dunes on Sardinia's southwestern coast, called Europe's little desert
